Dates: From September 21 5:50 p.m. to September 24 last race
Description: Due to the Harvest Festival, the shutdownPlace Purydirection Cormondrèche is moved Thursday from 5:50 p.m. then deleted from Friday.
Alternative Route:
From Thursday 5:50 p.m., stop moved: departures fromPlace Pury, quay C.
From Friday first race, stop removed: meet at the stopOriette, platform B(on rue de la Balance) to take line 106 toLockthen transship to line 101.

Dates: From September 21 5:50 p.m. to September 24 last race
Description:
Due to the Harvest Festival, the shutdownPlace Purydirection Marin is moved Thursday from 5:50 p.m. then deleted from Friday.
From Thursday 5:50 p.m., stop moved: departures from
Place Pury, quay G.
Alternative Route:
From Friday first race, stop removed: meet at the stopOriette, quayB (on rue de la Balance) to take line 106 toStation (North)then Fun'ambule line 110 toUniversityto transship to line 101.
During the night, the Fun'ambule only runs until 1:00 a.m. Between 1 a.m. and 4 a.m., it is therefore advisable to walk to the stopUniversity.
